entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023
